summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. B-152, for the improvement of West 57th Street, formerly Wilbert Street, from 28th Avenue Northwest, formerly 6th Avenue, to 32nd Avenue Northwest, formerly 8th Avenue, by constructing a sewer, under Ordinance No. 1225, of the former City of Ballard and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
